Uses of Package
ch.pschatzmann.edgar.base

  • Packages that use ch.pschatzmann.edgar.base 
    Package Description
    ch.pschatzmann.edgar.base
    Basic XBRL Query functionality which provides access to the loaded information (Facts, Context, Labels).
    ch.pschatzmann.edgar.dataload
    Download XBRL information to files and/or to a jdbc database
    ch.pschatzmann.edgar.dataload.online
    Implements the missing API to provide filings by company.
    ch.pschatzmann.edgar.dataload.rss
    Get updates from https://www.sec.gov
    ch.pschatzmann.edgar.parsing
    Parsing of XBRL files
    ch.pschatzmann.edgar.reporting.company
    Automatic generation of SQL request to provide the parameters for one company
    ch.pschatzmann.edgar.service
    REST Web Services to access the Edgar data
  • Classes in ch.pschatzmann.edgar.base used by ch.pschatzmann.edgar.base 
    Class Description
    Context
    Context for the calculation of the date and segment attribute
    EdgarCompany
    The Standard Industrial Code SIC information and the states information is not available via the SEC filings.
    EdgarFiling
    Simple API to provide access to File filings
    Fact
    Representation of a XML/XLS tag with its attribute values.
    Fact.Attribute  
    Fact.DataType  
    Fact.Type  
    FactValue
    Fact which represents a node of type 'value'.
    ICompany
    Provides information about a Filing Company
    IndexAPI
    Index to find facts by attribute values.
    Label
    Label information
    LabelAPI
    Access to the label information
    Presentation
    Unfortunately the reporting tree structure is not matching the xml tag hierarchy but is specified with from to nodes.
    PresentationAPI
    API for the presentation layer.
    Segment
    Segment information in XBRL file
    XBRL
    XBRL Parser.
    XBRL.SegmentScope
